data.eml:eml: Eukoenenia virgemdalapa (Palpigradi: Eukoeneniidae): a new troglobitic palpigrade from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souza, Maysa F. V. R., Ferreira, Rodrigo L. (2012): Eukoenenia virgemdalapa (Palpigradi: Eukoeneniidae): a new troglobitic palpigrade from Brazil. Zootaxa 3295: 59-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280866
